description: Rich guy, couple, sitting at the table, in a dark room, with a big window
text:
Rich guy: Let's get started.
Husband: What should I know about you?

description: Rich guy, sitting at the table, couple, standing, in a dark room, with a big window
text:
Rich guy: I'm a very private person.
Wife: We understand.

description: Rich guy, couple, standing, in a dark room, with a big window
text:
Rich guy: I've made a lot of enemies.
Husband: Why are you telling us this?

description: Rich guy, sitting at the table, couple, standing, in a dark room, with a big window
text:
Rich guy: Because I need your help.
Wife: What do you want us to do?

description: Rich guy, couple, standing, in a dark room, with a big window
text:
Rich guy: I want you to find out who's after me.
Husband: We'll do our best.
